content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) NEW YORK  November 03 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has assigned a Long-Term Issuer Default Rating (IDR) of 'BBB-' to AutoNation  Inc. Fitch has also assigned a 'BBB-' rating to the company's senior unsecured revolver and notes  and an 'F3' Short-Term IDR to the company's $1 billion CP program. The Rating Outlook is Stable. A full list of ratings follows at the end of this release. The ratings reflect AutoNation's steady operating margins over
name: AutoNation Inc
title: Fitch Assigns 'BBB-' IDR to AutoNation; Outlook Stable

title: AutoNation announces Waymo fleet repair deal  shares jump

title: Texas plumber sues dealer after company pickup appears in Syria militant photo
